name: Pi Pi
description:
Pi Pi the cloud just wants to play but the army men are trying to hurt him.  Use your acid rain and lightening to wreak havoc and destroy them all.  Survive the endless waves of enemies and rack up as much points as possible. 

Pi Pi is a simple yet fun game similar to the likes of space invaders.  Dodge the onslaught of enemy fire and rain on the enemies to rack up points .
